post.body: zeronet目前的功能已经非常完美了，唯一的问题可能就是用户数还太少吧
It would be better if ZeroMe is designed as Twitter/Weibo style with information stream in the main page

comment.body: @FraYoshi: Some media just like CNN or BBC are also needed here for a stable news broadcasting, I guess
@FraYoshi:  River of News seems to be updated more frequently but with ugly user-interface, hahaha. Thanks!
